timeline.message:
Map two inner classes

Signed-off-by: liach <liach@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText: targeted.get() looks weird. Shouldn't be either targetedAngleRandomizer.get() or targeted.getAngle()?
timeline.author: Runemoro

timeline.author: Juuxel
timeline.diffHunk:

replies.bodyText: Hmm, JigsawBlockEntity.Runtime doesn't sound like a... structure piece
replies.author: liach

replies.bodyText: I meant like what does Runtime mean in this case?
replies.author: Juuxel

replies.bodyText: a runtime structure piece. name from structure piece type
replies.author: liach

timeline.message: Rename angle randomizer fields to have more informative names
